q1.question: What is LyDian AI ecosystem?
q1.answer: LyDian AI is an integrated artificial intelligence ecosystem that brings together 5 expert platforms for medical AI, legal AI, intelligent chat, IQ testing, and business consulting under one roof. You can access all platforms with a single account, and your data synchronizes across platforms.

q2.question: Which languages do you support?
q2.answer: All our platforms support 40+ languages including English, Spanish, German, Arabic, Russian, Chinese. Multi-language support is available for both text and voice interaction.

q3.question: Is my data secure?
q3.answer: Yes. All your data is protected with end-to-end encryption. We are GDPR, HIPAA (for medical data), and SOC 2 Type II compliant. Your data is not used for AI model training and is not shared with third parties.

q4.question: Do you provide API access?
q4.answer: Yes. We provide REST API access for all platforms in Pro and Enterprise plans. You can integrate with your own applications and create custom chatbots. Detailed API documentation is available.

q5.question: How do I upgrade from free to paid plan?
q5.answer: You can upgrade to Pro or Enterprise plan anytime from account settings. The transition is instant, your free plan data is preserved. We offer a 14-day money-back guarantee.
